name: Damaged Thrusters
description: Reduce the ship's speed by 1. Stacks.

name: Minor Energy Loss
description: Reduce the ship's total energy output by 10%. Stacks.

name: Targeting System Glitch
description: All weapon systems of the ship suffer -1 pool. Stacks

name: Debris
description: A random crew member suffers 2d6 damage.

name: Janky Controls
description: The ship suffers -1 pool on all piloting checks.

name: Glitching Ship Internals
description: All repair attempts on the ship suffer -1 pool.

name: Just A Dent
description: No further effects other than the injury pool modifier.

name: Energy Conduit Overload
description: Lose the ship's base energy production.

name: Shield Collapse
description: The shield generator stops working until repaired.

name: Damaged Antennas
description: All Sensor operations suffer -3 pool. Stacks

name: Discharge
description: An amount of crew members equal to the bridge size of the ship lose 2d6 health each.

name: Computer name
description: The board AI shuts down.

name: Weapon Jam
description: A random weapon system becomes unoperable until repaired.

name: Armor Ablation
description: Reduce the primary and secondary soak by 1. Stacks.

name: Generator Shutdown
description: Deactivate the strongest remaining energy generator.

name: Module Damage
description: One random module of your ship is unusable until repaired. The GM rolls on all remaining modules and uses their capacity as a weight to determine which module gets hit.

name: Radiation Leak
description: All crew take 1d6 damage (ignoring armor and soak).

name: Lost Cargo
description: 25% of the cargo's items are ejected into space, suffering immense damage.

name: Fuel Line Rupture
description: The ship immediately loses 50% of its remaining fuel.

name: Comm System Failure
description: Communication systems and electronical warfare become unavailable.

name: Hull Breach
description: Loss of atmosphere within 1d6 rounds.

name: Engine Shutdown
description: The ship cannot perform maneuver, dock or evade actions any longer. Since the engine shuts down, artificial gravity is also lost - crew members may have to perform Zero-G checks for specific actions aboard the ship.

name: Crew Injury
description: A random crew has to perform an injury roll with 8 dice.

name: Bridge Compromise
description: All bridge crew needs to perform a Survival d4 check. If they fail, they become unconscious. Otherwise they suffer a random severity 2 injury.

name: Weapon Loss
description: A random weapon system is permanently destroyed - it requires replacement.

name: Lost Crew Member
description: A random crew member gets ejected into space.

name: Total Shutdown
description: All systems become unusable, and the ship is drifting dead in space.

name: Structural Collapse
description: The ship breaks into several pieces, which each section having little to no energy.

name: Generator Overload
description: The ship explodes in a large fireball.
